name: English জানালা
description: A learning platform to help users improve their English skills from basics to advanced levels through interactive lessons, quizzes, vocabulary practice, and structured courses. The site provides an engaging experience for learners to build vocabulary, practice language skills, and track progress in an easy-to‑use interface.

name: Finance
description: Finance is a web-based financial management application designed to help users track income, expenses, and investments efficiently. It provides an intuitive interface to manage personal finances and analyze financial data for better decision-making.

name: BookCourier
description: BookCourier is a full-stack web application designed to manage book delivery services efficiently. The platform allows users to browse services, place delivery requests, and track orders, while admins can manage users, bookings, and delivery status through a secure dashboard.
